doc:
Harry Steppe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Steppe 0 Harry Steppe (born Abraham Stepner), March 16, 1888 – November 22, 1934 was a Russian Jewish-American actor, musical comedy performer, headliner comedian, writer, librettist, director and producer, who toured North America working in Vaudeville and Burlesque. Steppe performed at several well-known theaters on the Columbia, Mutual and Orpheum circuits. Steppe was one of Bud Abbott's first partners. Harry Steppe ( born_Abraham_Stepner ) , March_16_,_1888 – November_22_,_1934 was a_Russian_Jewish-American_actor , musical_comedy_performer , headliner_comedian , writer_,_librettist_,_director_and_producer , who toured North_America working in Vaudeville_and_Burlesque . Steppe performed at several_well-known_theaters on the_Columbia_,_Mutual_and_Orpheum_circuits . Steppe was one of Bud_Abbott 's_first_partners .
